p: Among the few terpenes detected in xylem tissue, the XY samples showed significantly higher contents of (−)-α-pinene, (+)-α-pinene, (−)-camphene, borneol and β-caryophyllene than the XM samples ( Figure 3). As already observed for cortical tissues, the amount of (+)/(−)-β-pinene did not show significant differences between samples of the two ages.
